price: ߡߊ߲߬ߛߊ߬ߦߊ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߓߟߏ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ( ߟߊ߫ ߞߏ ) ߓߊ߲ߓߊ߲ߣߍ߲߫ ߠߋ߫ ߘߋ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߋ ߟߋ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߋ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߞߏ ߓߍ߯ ߟߊ߫
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī biyadihi al-mul'ku wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
